item.title: DeepSeek-V3, ultra-large open-source AI, outperforms Llama and Qwen on launch
item.description: The new model shows open-source closing in on closed-source models, suggesting reduced chances of one big AI player ruling the game.

item.title: OpenAI’s o3 shows remarkable progress on ARC-AGI, sparking debate on AI reasoning
item.description: o3 solved one of the most difficult AI challenges, scoring 75.7% on the ARC-AGI benchmark. But does it really mean we're closer to AGI?

item.title: Learn how GE Healthcare used AWS to build a new AI model that interprets MRIs
item.description: Here's how GE Healthcare overcame challenges of 2D and created the industry’s first full-body 3D MRI research foundation model.

item.title: The 4 biggest AI stories from 2024 and one key prediction for 2025
item.description: By all measures, 2024 was the biggest year for artificial intelligence yet — at least when it comes to the commercialization.

item.title: The code whisperer: How Anthropic’s Claude is changing the game for software developers
item.description: Artificial intelligence assistants like Anthropic's Claude, once viewed with skepticism, have become indispensable software development tools.
